explicacion_normal: Normal Agents - Distribute 9 dice between your character's four skills. Skills can range from 1 to 4
explicacion_preternatural: Weird Agents - Distribute 10 dice between your character's four skills. Skills can range from 0 to 10. Leftover dice are put in Cool
resultado6: Amazing! Describe the result and gain 2 Franchise Dice.
resultado5: Good. Describe the result and gain 1 Franchise Dice.
resultado4: Fair. Describe the mostly positive result of your action but you must include negative of humorous effect.
resultado3: Not Great. The GM decides your fate but you may be given a chance to suggest a single positive (albeit minor) effect.
resultado2: Bad. The GM decides your fate or you may suggest something suitably negative.
resultado1: Terrible! The GM gets to hose you with a truly dire situation resulting from your incompetence.
